Summary: bullet like object flying at high altitude leaving trail and then disapearing
divs: Sighting Detailsobject appear to be in reentry leaving a large trail at a high speed very meteor like. i almost thought it was a missle but it was coming downwards very fast, also a fuel tank or even a space shuttle.the part that surprised me the most was that all the sudden as if it had reached a certain point the trail stopped and i could see a dim shinny object come out of it and stand somewhat still, i was traveling down the i-15 at 80mph so it was hard to judge the speed but it dissapeared after that.i assumed that the object had burned in space but to see something that resemble a spacecraft come out of that cloud and move like a craft really got my heart pumping! blessings rob
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in unknown
There were no other sightings in unknown on or around November 12th 2007
